You empower a piece of ammunition with hellish sigils and markings, or charge a loaded ranged weapon with a similar power, and grant it a brief infernal power.

The next ranged Strike you make with this weapon before the end of your turn deals @Damage[1d6[fire,persistent]] damage. At 10th level, this damage increases to 2d6. You can perform this action as part of Reloading your weapon.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.feats.Item.9V1HPVC6hQ5Jd9EW]{Effect: Hellfire Shot}

This fire is considered Unholy for the purposes of sanctification, and will deal persistent spirit damage instead of fire if it would be more detrimental (as determined by the GM).
